comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: If this photo dates from before 1916, this must be the former Irene Leary, the chorus girl who married Yale football star Maurice "Lefty" Flynn (seen here and here in other Bain photos), in January, 1913. They separated after 11 days and were divorced the next year. Flynn married again in March, 1916, to Blanche Palmer.

comment.author: 77341969@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/whyaduck] 
WHYADUCK: The photo may well have been taken prior to her marriage to Lefty Flynn.  I'm guessing this is indeed the former Blanche Palmer.
